software: Photo courtesy the Collection of Jack and Beverly Wilgus..Phineas Gage holding the iron bar that shot through his head by the force of an explosion. "Here is business enough for you," Gage told the first doctor to treat him after a premature detonation on a railroad-building site turned a tamping iron into a missile. ....
